name: auth-otp-sent.toml

event.name: OTP Code Sent
event.description: Verification code sent to user phone

payload.name: app
payload.description: Which app sent the OTP (client, specialist)

backend.description: Generates 6-digit OTP, stores with 5 min expiry, sends SMS via provider

rawContent:
[event]
id = "auth.otp_sent"
name = "OTP Code Sent"
description = "Verification code sent to user phone"
category = "auth"

[trigger]
action = "click"
element = "Send Code button"

[[payload]]
name = "phone"
type = "string"
description = "Last 4 digits of phone number (masked)"

[[payload]]
name = "app"
type = "string"
description = "Which app sent the OTP (client, specialist)"

[backend]
description = "Generates 6-digit OTP, stores with 5 min expiry, sends SMS via provider"

[relations]
entities = ["user"]
routes = ["client-login", "specialist-login"]
